InteropTopicDetail.name: InteropTopicDetail
InteropTopicDetail.description: Represents the details of an interoperability topic.

DetailRecordId.description: The detail record added to the interoperability topic.

DetailType.description: The type of detail added to the interoperability topic.

InteropTopicId.description: The interoperability topic for which the details are added.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the interoperability topic detail record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the interoperability topic detail record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the interoperability topic detail.
